vv64:10.2: nādo → nādī (sya1ed, pts-vp-pli1); nādi (sya2ed, pts-vp-pli-a, mr)
vv64:20.2: hadayeritaṃ pītiṃ → hadayeritaṃ pati (bj, pts-vp-pli2); hadayeritampi taṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
vv64:22.4: hadayeritaṃ pītiṃ → hadayeritaṃ pati (bj, pts-vp-pli2); hadayeritampi taṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
vv64:23.3: Uposathaṃ kaṃ vā → uposathaṃ kiṃ va (sya1ed, sya2ed)
vv64:24.1: Nayīdamappassa katassa → nayidaṃ appassa katassa (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2); sāsedaṃ appakatassa (mr)
vv64:33.1: Nayimasmiṃ loke parasmiṃ → imasmiṃ loke parasmiṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); nayimasmiṃ vā loke parasmiṃ (^kv4.3#63 [Sattarasamavagga/ Navattabbaṃbuddhassadinnaṃmahapphalantikathā]); nayimasmi loke va parasmi (?)
